meanings.definition: Resembling a wave in form or motion.
meanings.sent1: The wavelike pattern on the sand looked beautiful in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The ocean had a wavelike motion that was calming to watch.
meanings.sent3: The wavelike dance moves of the clown made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her wavelike hair flowed down her back like a cascade of silk.
meanings.sent5: The wavelike sound of the wind through the trees was soothing.

meanings.definition: Moving or undulating in a manner similar to a wave.
meanings.sent1: The wavelike motion of the flag caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The snake's wavelike movement across the ground was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The wavelike pattern on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her wavelike handwriting flowed elegantly across the page.
meanings.sent5: The wavelike path of the roller coaster gave riders a thrilling experience.
